Job Title: Cyber Security Guru ç½‘ç»œå®‰å…¨å¤§å¸ˆ

baseï¼šHongkong/Singapore

Job Summary:
As part of Pionex' international technology team, we are looking for a Cyber Security Engineer to implement technical cybersecurity controls to fortify the security defence of the company.

Join our dynamic and thriving team in the thrilling world of cryptocurrency! We offer an exciting opportunity to fortify our company's digital defenses while maintaining global technical compliance.

About You:
If you're passionate about cybersecurity and looking for a place where your skills will make a significant impact, we want you!

Responsibilities:
â€¢Lead the installation, configuration, management, and monitoring of essential information security controls such as SIEM, IPS/IDS, firewall, vulnerability scanner, and Patch Management.
â€¢Operationalize and fine-tune SIEM tool for optimal detection, response, and mitigation of security incidents.
â€¢Battle and guard against cyber attacks and malicious hacking activities while enhancing the SIEM alert correlation and incident response mechanisms.
â€¢Shape and enforce IT security policies, guidelines, and standards, especially those related to SIEM operations.
â€¢Lead IT Incident Response and handling, focusing on SIEM's role in incident identification and mitigation and implement IT Disaster Recovery and Business Continuity.
â€¢Engage in Security Awareness Training that includes SIEM functionality and release security advisories.
â€¢Contribute and innovate SIEM operations by recommending improvements to existing processes to reduce security breaches.
â€¢Collaborate with the development team in the design and implementation of the SSDLC process.

Qualifications:
â€¢A degree in a relevant field from a respected university.
â€¢At least three years of professional experience in enterprise Cybersecurity with significant exposure to SIEM operations.
â€¢Experience in AWS security, managing incident response, and SIEM operations is a must.
â€¢Quick learner with a deep passion for Information Security.
â€¢Excellent communication skills, able to work independently as well as a good team player.
â€¢Understanding of MAS TRM Guidelines.
â€¢Proficiency in English and Chinese is a plus.
â€¢Hunger for learning, growth, and the willingness to contribute in a fast-paced, entrepreneurial environment will make you stand out!

Note: While all the mentioned qualifications will be of advantage, we are more interested in individuals who have a deep desire to learn, a passion for SIEM operations, and a strive for excellence.
